Address.label: Address
Address.value: 520 BROAD STREET, NEWARK, New Jersey, 07102, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: IDT Corp is a multinational holding company. It primarily operates in the telecommunications and payment industries. It has two reportable business segments, Telecom & Payment Services, and net2phone. The Telecom & Payment Services segment that derives majority revenue provides retail telecommunications and payment offerings as well as wholesale international long-distance traffic termination. The net2phone segment provides unified cloud communications and telephony services to business customers.
